GeneratedDoc.name: entity
GeneratedDoc.Intro: This table lists a bunch of columns that have different information in them. We want to say something about htem, but don't know what to say.

Item.name: type
Item.Field: Type of entity. entity_type enum supports both entity and group types.

Item.name: name
Item.Field: Entityâ€™s current display name. While display names may change over time, the data tracks only the most recent display name.

Item.name: environment
Item.Field: The kind of environment the entity e xists in (cloud, on-prem, hybrid, etc.). See the environment_type enum for the list of values.

Item.name: attrs
Item.Field: Information that is specific for the given entity type.

Item.name: first_seen
Item.Field: A topology timestamp for when this entity first appeared.

Item.name: last_seen
Item.Field: A topology timestamp for when this entity last appeared. A value of 9999-12-31T23:59:59 means the entity still exists in latest market cycle.
